item.title: Go net/http ç¤ºä¾‹
item.description: Go net/http ç¤ºä¾‹ http.HandleFunc("/login", func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { var req model.LoginReq accountType, _ := strconv.ParseInt(r.FormValue("accountType"), 10, 32) req.AccountType = int32(accountType) req.Account = r.FormValue("account") req.Pwd = r.FormValue("pwd") req.HeadImgUrl = r.FormValue("headImgUrl") req.FbToken = r.FormValue("fbToken") req.FbUserId = r.FormValue("fbUserId") logrus.Infof("user login: %v", req) res, _ := json.Marshal(service.Login(req, *r)) w.Write(res) })
